title: Did President Trump give the finger to the Italian Prime Minister?
subtitle: A viral video that some claim shows that the President of the United States is making an outrageous gesture in Prime Minister Paulo Gentiloni is open to interpretation.
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Trump raised his middle finger to present an indecisive gesture to the Italian Prime Minister (Paloo Gentiloni) during the 2017 G-7 Summit in Italy.
